title: Ideal
body: hii guyss, i try to purchase RP 3 days now but i cant.. does anyone know whats wrong ? Greetzzz

replies.body:
There are currently some issues with the iDEAL payment method at the moment. We're aware of it and are still investigating, however at the moment it appears it's outside of our influence and we're waiting for a third-party response. I suggest contacting ING Bank support if you'd like more information on this issue.

As there's currently no workaround, I recommend using an alternative payment method for now.

Apologies for the trouble this caused, but please let me know if you have any further questions.

We'll need more details in order to assist you.

1. What method of purchase are you selecting?
2. Are you receiving an error message?
